object.name: TrackerMon_firstRunId
object.description: firstRunId

object.name: TrackerMon_lastRunId
object.description: lastRunId

object.name: TimeStampFirstEvt
object.description: Time of the first event

object.name: TimeStampLastEvt
object.description: Time of the last event

object.name: TrueTimeInterval
object.description: Time interval

object.name: Bin_Start
object.description: Start of the bin; this is the timestamp (in ULong64_t) of the first event.

object.name: Bin_End
object.description: End of the bin; this is the timestamp (in ULong64_t) of the last event.

object.name: Mean_TOT_Peak_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the mean ToT peak value in fC

object.name: Mean_TOT_Peak_TowerPlane_err[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the error in the mean ToT peak value in fC

object.name: Mean_TOT_Peak_TowerPlane_n[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the number of events used to compute TOT_Peak (TOT_Entries in trackermon input root file).

object.name: Mean_TOT_LWidth_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the TOT Landau width

object.name: Mean_TOT_LWidth_TowerPlane_err[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the error in the TOT Landau width

object.name: Mean_TOT_LWidth_TowerPlane_n[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the number of events used to compute TOT_LWidth (TOT_Entries in trackermon input root file).

object.name: Mean_TOT_GSigma_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the TOT Gaussian sigma

object.name: Mean_TOT_GSigma_TowerPlane_err[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the error in the TOT Gaussian sigma

object.name: Mean_TOT_GSigma_TowerPlane_n[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the number of events used to compute TOT_GSigma (TOT_Entries in trackermon input root file).

object.name: Number_TOT_FitProb_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the TOT Fit Probability

object.name: Number_TOT_FracLowTOT_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the fraction of low TOT events

object.name: Number_fracSat_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the fraction of saturation events per layer

object.name: Number_stripOcc_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the layer average strip occupancy

object.name: Number_LATAverage_stripOcc
object.description: LAT average strip occupancy

object.name: Number_layerOcc_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the layer OR occupancy

object.name: Mean_trigEff_Tower[16]
object.description: Vector [16] reporting the tower average trigger efficiency

object.name: Mean_trigEff_Tower_err[16]
object.description: Vector [16] reporting the error in the tower average trigger efficiency

object.name: Mean_trigEff_Tower_n[16]
object.description: Vector [16] reporting the number of events used to compute trigEff (TOT_Entries[tower] in trackermon input root file).

object.name: Mean_towerEff_Tower[16]
object.description: Vector [16] reporting the tower average hit efficiency

object.name: Mean_towerEff_Tower_err[16]
object.description: Vector [16] reporting the error in the tower average hit efficiency

object.name: Mean_towerEff_Tower_n[16]
object.description: Vector [16] reporting the number of events used to compute towerEff (TOT_Entries[tower] in trackermon input root file).

object.name: Mean_layerdXY_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the mean displacement per layer

object.name: Mean_layerdXY_TowerPlane_err[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the error in the mean displacement per layer

object.name: Mean_layerdXY_TowerPlane_n[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the number of events used to compute layerdXY (TOT_Entries in trackermon input root file).

object.name: Mean_layerEff_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the layer average hit efficiency

object.name: Mean_layerEff_TowerPlane_err[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the error in the layer average hit efficiency

object.name: Mean_layerEff_TowerPlane_n[16][36]
object.description: Vector [16][36] reporting the number of events used to compute layerEff (TOT_Entries in trackermon input root file).
